summary:
The 2008 election was held on November 4, 2008, with Democrat Barack Obama and Republican John McCain as the main candidates. Obama, along with his running mate Joe Biden, won, making him the first African American president.

Obama's campaign focused on change and opposition to the Iraq War. He won many states that hadn't voted Democratic in decades. McCain struggled due to his association with unpopular President George W. Bush and his erratic response to the 2008 financial crisis. Obama won a big victory, getting more votes than any Democrat since 1964.
title: 2008 United States presidential election
